name: Kappa LDN
slogan: Marrying eye-catching designs with exquisite functionality
description: Our software's goal is to fuse AI with an elegant solution to revolutionise how the dental practice is managed across all the roles from the dentist to the hygienist and the manager.

jobs.title: Jr Software Engineer
jobs.description:
**Ever stumbled upon a system so outdated you just want to flip the table and leave?**

That's how many UK dentists feel, and we're here to change that üë®üèª‚Äçüíª

Pen and paper notes, an archaic set of communication channels and a record keeping that feels like it's running on coal. We're not talking about the good ol' times, but the current status of the dentistry software.

Time waste is king. Dentists or nurses have to handwrite and browse through stacks of patient notes on a daily basis. Appointments get delayed because calendars can't be adapted to anyone's preferences. And guess who's suffering the most? You, the patient.

So what would the solution be? The answer is a mammoth-of-a-project that will bring to life an  intelligent piece of software, a revolutionary system that provides timely and relevant suggestions, automates most of the manual tasks and allows dentists to actually focus on their practice. Our goal is to implement this within every dental practice in the UK. 

Such a project requires a wide set of skills, resources, solid financial support, and the right people. Check, check, check, and this is where you come in. We're the tech bunch the market warned corporations about üëª

We've put together a cherry-picked team of experts that is supported by a group of industry experts. 

**We want you to join us ü§ü** 

Why? Because we've created an organised and flexible environment, a friendly and innovative squad and taken up a truly exciting project. Our mission is to contribute to the greater good by doing the things we're good at. 

This position is for individuals who enjoy freedom and can make crucial decisions on their own. Collaboration is key, as the team must efficiently achieve the project end goal. Work around task blockages and find ways to bring inventive solutions to the table. Being proactive is vital. We're looking for people who can take risks, dive into the unexplored üïµüèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è, and shed light on obscure areas via ingenious approaches.
